title: Varela
body: This family name comes from Lopo Dias de Lira Varela, son of Afonso de Aragão, a Neapolitan knight. Lopo Dias served in Africa, became a nobleman of the royal household in 1515, and a professed knight of the Order of Christ.

Lopo Dias de Lira Varela: Son of Afonso de Aragão, Neapolitan knight, nobleman of the royal household in 1515, professed knight of the Order of Christ

1515: Lopo Dias de Lira Varela becomes a nobleman of the royal household and a professed knight of the Order of Christ
